title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Blended Learning-Based Foundational English Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can compose sentences for daily life and work-related contexts using 150 basic English words and fundamental grammar structures.
Learners can read simple English passages, summarize key content, and achieve over 70% comprehension.
Learners can deliver a 3+ minute presentation using basic English expressions and submit improvements based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
